name: Spider (itch) (Blackthornprod Games)
description:
Control the queen spider Feed your larvae and turn them into spider soldiers Watch your nest crawl with spiders Use your army to attack the King Upgrade the shop

-----

Also discover another version of the game that features different foods that will give your spiders various powers!
